translation: Perform your bounden duty, for action is superior to inaction, and even the maintenance of the body would not be possible for you through inaction.
commentary: 3.8 Fixed bounden (prescribed or obligatory)? Do perform? Karma action? You thou? Karma action? Jyayah superior? Hi for? Akarmanaḥ than inaction? body journey maintenance of the body? Even even? f and? And thy? Not not? Would it be possible to become famous? Akarmanaḥ by inaction.Commentary Niyatam Karma is an obligatory duty which one is bound to perform. Thenonperformance of the boundary duties causes demerit.
